[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200417/6b4fc5e96e16c1284703d100559d9ae1.plist[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200417/833d916ed68afd04f9ed44bdd5485365.jpg[/IMG]

Kitty Bransfield played first base for the Pirates in the 1903 World Series. Had 6 hits.  

Abstein played for the Buccos in the 1909 World Series. 

Kitty has been loved well. Probably VG. Abstein presents very nicely. Had a couple of barely noticing flecks on the surface loss on the back. And and very slight bend in the top that was unnoticed by me for years until is out a flashlight on it for this listing.  Has fat borders, nice edges, decent corners, and great color and gloss. 

$75 shipped for the pair via PayPal f/f or add 3% for fees. 

Happy to answer questions. Pm is best.

PayPal email [url]jcfowler6@zoominternet.net[/url]

Regards

Jon


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
